value:
$WmMPID_聖祭ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Holy21,Face|I, too, am descended from Sword
Saint Od. I cannot allow myself to
appear in any way clumsy!$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ナンナ,ch07_03_Nanna_F_Holy21,Face|And I must not bring shame to the
name of the black knight Hoðr...
Will you help us, Lord Lewyn?$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭レヴィン,ch06_16_Levn_M_Holy21,Face|As ever, I am nothing but a feckless
minstrel... Singing of the crusaders
suits me better than fighting, but...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_聖祭ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Holy21,Face|I have not mastered using this
weapon yet—but I will not give up!$k$p$Sbs150|
